programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep199200
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Pingtung Spring Music Festival(M) Ep3
programme.desc: Pingtung Spring Music Festival is an annual activity held in every April in Pingtung, Taiwan. This year line-up is even stronger than last year, let's celebrate Spring with all the well-known artistes!

programme.title: Let’s Go Crazy on Live!(M) Ep2627
programme.desc: As an ordinary girl, working an ordinary job, at an ordinary convenience store, Lin An An had only one dream in life: to find a good, stable, government job so she could support her aging grandfather. With that single dream in mind, An An never even thought of becoming anything more than the ordinary girl she had always been. But all that changed the day You Yuan Le walked into her life.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: True Legend
programme.desc: Su Can was once a top general but choose to return to his hometown to study martial arts and enjoy family time with his wife and son. However, his wife was killed and the family became victims of conspiracies. Su was heartbroken and wandered like a beggar with his son. One day, he met the "God of Martial Arts" and learnt Drunken Fist from him.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: A young constable unwittingly gets involved with a secret organization named Wu Yin Men, where all members have supernatural abilities and have protected mankind for centuries. When he learns that mysterious demons with power to destroy the world are increasing, the adventure to hunt them down with Wu Yin Men begins!

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country’s energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy about a murdered cop returning from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie (Chow) into avenging his death.

programme.title: Dragon Hero
programme.desc: Four young fighters join forces to fight against Japanese aggression. Known as the Four Little Fortunes, they use martial arts to foil the Japanese plan of a major military invasion.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killer’s mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened…

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kong’s legendary detective?

programme.title: Tears of No Regret
programme.desc: Monkey King is bewitched and harmed by an evil spirit, who is none other than goddess Lucky Star in its previous life, whom Monkey King knows 300 years ago. He decides to travel back in time to find out what happened…

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about ‘home and country’ is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the ‘fathers’ forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the ‘fighting’ spirit through generations.

programme.title: Kung Fu Chefs
programme.desc: After being ousted from the clan, disgraced chef Wong encounters cooking prodigy Lung and takes him on as a new disciple in his new restaurant. With the Top Chef competition coming up, it's now up to Lung to reclaim his master's honour, even if the other side is not fighting fair…

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect’s Zhang Chui Shan’s son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters’ best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man’s role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she’s soon framed for her husband’s murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense…

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family’s objection, so Hong’s maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill’s nieces!

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hung escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hung for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hung escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancée Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman & coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: When the Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor’s plot once again.

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlord’s home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists’ cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: After killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk, Wu Song is appointed as chief constable. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang seduces Wu Song but gets rejected and later engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang after he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother’s death, Wu Song kills the two of them.

programme.title: That Man In Chang-an
programme.desc: The Han Emperor dies and his Empress Lu seizes the ruling power. She plots to kill the heir to the throne, Liu Heng, but the masked warrior discovers her plot and tips off Liu. Liu sends his princess to Chang An to ask for help. The masked warrior protects the princess from attackers along the way and supports Liu to become the new Emperor.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a police’s son, blames his father for his mother’s death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn’s beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong’s concubine as he knows Dong’s adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lin’s husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: The House of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend’s baby...

programme.title: Swordsman and Enchantress
programme.desc: The story happens in a martial arts world where everyone tries to obtain the "Deer Sword". Lian's wife is wounded in an ambush and his rival Xiao saves her. They escape to Xiao’s home and he treats her poisonous wound. This leads Lian to suspect his wife’s faithfulness and results in several blood-splattering duels with Xiao.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Accepted to the Golden Sword School after his father sacrificed his life to save his master, Fang Kang is resented by his fellow pupils and decides to leave. His master's daughter challenges him to a fight and cuts off his arm. Fang masters the art of sword fighting with one arm and finds himself returning to the School to save his master again.

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s “a-go-go” era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon’s pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother’s Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang (Ho Fan) is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey (Chou Lung Chang), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun) have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep34
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep35
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep38
programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sabhaapathy
programme.desc: Sabhaapathy, a man with a speech impairment, desperately looks for a job to earn a living. One day, his life turns upside down as he ends up with a corrupt politician's suitcase filled with money.

programme.title: Selfie
programme.desc: An ill-tempered engineering student becomes embroiled in an underground college admissions racket. Soon, he and his friends become the targets of gangsters and loan sharks.

programme.title: Usthad Hotel
programme.desc: An emerging chef comes back to his hometown as his father refuses to support him. To chase his dream, the former starts working at his grandfather's hotel.

programme.title: Fida
programme.desc: Jai falls in love with Neha, unaware of her and her boyfriend Vikram's evil intentions. He easily gets trapped in their conspiracy but decides to exact revenge while being on the run from the police.

programme.title: Saajan
programme.desc: Brothers Aman and Akash fall in love with Pooja. While both of them are willing to sacrifice their love for each other's sake, Pooja must make her decision.

programme.title: One By Two
programme.desc: Amit struggles with a mundane life and a recent breakup, while Samara, an aspiring dancer, tries to win a reality show. After several accidental escapes, the strangers' paths finally cross.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Gomti Ke Kinare
programme.desc: Sameer lives with his mother and maternal uncle under poor conditions until he lands a job with a reputed firm. His happiness is short-lived as he soon discovers an ugly truth about his family.

programme.title: Ishq Vishk
programme.desc: To gain popularity in his college and get a girlfriend, Rajiv lies to Payal about being in love with her. After he tries to molest her and she leaves him, Rajiv pursues another woman.

programme.title: Yajamana
programme.desc: Krishna, the son-in-law of the village head, becomes the biggest enemy of Devi Shetty, a cruel gangster, when Devi decides to plunder the oil resources of the village and ruin villagers' livelihood.

programme.title: Meera
programme.desc: After Meera marries Rana Bhojraj to strengthen the ties between their clans, her husband learns about the man she loves. In response, he asks her to commit the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.desc: Five women with their own personal struggles travel to the Orange River for their “Adventure Therapy”. When things go awry in their river rafting adventure, their survival instincts kick in forcing them to dig deep.

programme.title: Dying To Defrost
programme.desc: This poor vampire has lived through the centuries, freezing down to the marrow! She’s at the end of her tether and she’s had enough. She’s going to do whatever it takes to feel the warmth on her skin, or it’ll be the death of her, AGAIN!!

programme.title: Bunny Kicks
programme.desc: A rabbit couple unexpectedly have a kitten and they struggle to raise her amongst their rabbit-only community.

programme.title: 7 Hours To Win Your Heart

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Taurus 1

programme.title: Imperfect Age
programme.desc: Camilla and Sara are best friends who love ballet. Camilla comes from a working-class while Sara has a wealthy father. When Sara passes a critical ballet audition and Camilla doesn’t, jealousy emerges and triggers a vendetta with tragic consequences.

programme.title: Don't Mess With Klara
programme.desc: Klara is a gifted cyber-agent who enjoys keeping both her professional and personal life under strict control. When her boyfriend suddenly breaks up with her for a new girl, she uses her skills to sabotage their relationship with hilarious consequences.

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: What was Mark Whitacre thinking? A rising star at agri-industry giant Archer Daniels Midland (ADM), Whitacre suddenly turns whistleblower. Even as he exposes his company's multi-national price-fixing conspiracy to the FBI, Whitacre envisions himself being hailed as a hero of the common man and handed a promotion. But before all that can happen, the FBI needs evidence, so Whitacre eagerly agrees to wear a wire and carry a hidden tape recorder in his briefcase, imagining himself as a kind of de facto secret agent. Unfortunately for the FBI, their lead witness hasn't been quite so forthcoming about helping himself to the corporate coffers. Whitacre's ever-changing account frustrates the agents and threatens the case against ADM as it becomes almost impossible to decipher what is real and what is the product of Whitacre's rambling imagination. Based on the true story of the highest-ranking corporate whistleblower in U.S. history.

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: Offering a new take on J.M. Barrie's classic story of a flying boy who never ages, acclaimed British director Joe Wright reimagines the ageless tale for audiences worldwide. Set during World War II, the story follows the orphaned Peter, who's kidnapped by pirates and brought to the magical Neverland, where he finds both fun and dangers and ultimately discovers his destiny to free the land from the pirate Blackbeard and become the hero who will forever be known as Peter Pan.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Based on the first volume in Philip Pullman's best-selling, award-winning trilogy, His Dark Materials, THE GOLDEN COMPASS unfolds an epic fantasy adventure set in a parallel world, where science and magic intertwine.Twelve-year-old Lyra Belacqua (played by newcomer Dakota Blue Richards) sets out to rescue her best friend, and ends up on an extraordinary quest to save not only her own world, but ours and others as well. Academy Award winner Nicole Kidman and stars with Daniel Craig in this triumph of the imagination. Filled with fascination, depth and wonder, Pullman's saga presents the eternal struggle of good vs. evil -- and the power of one young girl heal a rift torn in the fabric of the universe.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S21 Ep10
programme.desc: Must Be Held Accountable - A desperate father takes matters into his own hands in the case against his daughter's rapist.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S21 Ep11
programme.desc: She Paints For Vengeance - After a sexual assault investigation is stalled for months, a woman puts her accusations against a popular athlete on a billboard.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S21 Ep12
programme.desc: The Longest Night Of Rain - Benson investigates a police officer's accusations of sexual assault. Captain Tucker's retirement party ends in tragedy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S21 Ep13
programme.desc: Redemption In Her Corner - Kat steps over the line when she suspects a trainer at her boxing gym is taking advantage of his students.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep15
programme.desc: Hard Ball - Jack negotiates Josh's contract while Kenneth the Page earns a spot in Tracy's entourage.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep16
programme.desc: The Source Awards - Jack forces Tracy to attend The Source Awards, while Kenneth the Page catches the eye of a hip-hop star's girlfriend -- with special guest stars LL Cool J, Wayne Brady and Ghostface Killah.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep17
programme.desc: The Fighting Irish - Jack welcomes his brother Eddie (Special Guest Star Nathan Lane) into the 'TGS' family.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S10 Ep124
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S10 Ep80
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep14
programme.desc: Old Wounds - Following the cliffhanger Season 19 finale, with Special Agent Alden Parker still on the run with his ex-wife Vivian, the team investigates who from his past might have a personal vendetta against him in hopes of clearing Parker’s name.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep15
programme.desc: Unusual Suspects - Following the cliffhanger Season 19 finale, with Special Agent Alden Parker still on the run with his ex-wife Vivian, the team investigates who from his past might have a personal vendetta against him in hopes of clearing Parker’s name.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep16
programme.desc: Following the cliffhanger Season 19 finale, with Special Agent Alden Parker still on the run with his ex-wife Vivian, the team investigates who from his past might have a personal vendetta against him in hopes of clearing Parker’s name.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep17
programme.desc: Following the cliffhanger Season 19 finale, with Special Agent Alden Parker still on the run with his ex-wife Vivian, the team investigates who from his past might have a personal vendetta against him in hopes of clearing Parker’s name.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Series Premiere: Signature Dish - The 14 contestants were given 75 minutes to cook their signature dish. The contestants who cooked the top 2 dishes won the opportunity to bang the "immunity gong".

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Immunity Challenge: Honey - The contestants were shown how to extract honey from a Flow Hive. The contestants were then tasked to create a dish centred on honey.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Elimination Challenge: Blindfold Taste Test - Contestants were faced with the Jar Taste Test, where they were blindfolded and tasked with identifying a variety of ingredients inside jars.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Old & Young Mystery Box - This week's Mystery Box consist of blue cheese, dates, aged balsamic, black garlic, dry-aged sirloin, red dwarf apples, baby basil, baby snapper, baby carrots and beetroots, baby potatoes, and baby cauliflower.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Immunity Challenge: Keeping Up with Andy - Contestants had to replicate Andy's chipotle scotch fillet tacos, burnt jalapeño and avocado cream, and roasted corn salsa. They were not given a recipe and had to plate the dish within 30 seconds.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Elimination Challenge: Doughnuts Topping & Fillings - This week elimination challenge is set by Morgan Hipworth. The contestants are required to create a topping and filling for the doughnuts given by Morgan in 45 minutes, where the best three dishes will be safe.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Emelia Jackson's Mystery Box - Emelia Jackson returned to set up a mystery box challenge where the contestants were told to create a dish based on the ingredients that Emelia used to create her Mystery Box-shaped cake.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Immunity Challenge: Mr. X And The Hand Pulled Noodles - Contestants participated in an immunity challenge where the contestants were asked to make a noodle dish from Mr. Xu's hand-pulled noodles.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Junior S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Elimination Challenge: Winter Wonderland - The contestants entered the kitchen to find it snowing. The first round is an ice cream taste test. The second round is a pressure test in which they need to recreate Darren Purchase's "Snow".

programme.title: The Masked Singer S6 Ep1
programme.desc: 2 Night Season Premiere Part 1 - The characters in Group A perform, ending with a shocking double elimination.

programme.title: The Masked Singer S6 Ep2
programme.desc: 2 Night Season Premiere Part 2 - Group A returns and is joined by two wildcard contestants; an unmasking.

programme.title: The Masked Singer S6 Ep3
programme.desc: Group B Premiere - Group B members make their debut; an unmasking.

programme.title: The Masked Singer S6 Ep4
programme.desc: House Party - The Group A members return, and a new wildcard enters the game.

programme.title: The Masked Singer S6 Ep5
programme.desc: Date Night - Group B returns for a second time, and a new wildcard enters the game.

programme.title: The Masked Singer S6 Ep6
programme.desc: Time Warp - Group A takes the stage, another wildcard enters the game, and the first guest judge makes their first appearance.

programme.title: The Masked Singer S6 Ep7
programme.desc: All-Time Countdown - A countdown of the best performances of all time on the show.

programme.title: The Masked Singer S6 Ep8
programme.desc: Giving Thanks - Group B return to the stage, the final wild card enters the competition, and Joel McHale returns as a guest panellist.

programme.title: The Masked Singer S6 Ep9
programme.desc: Group A Semi-Final - The final four Group A singers compete in the semifinals and two are eliminated; guest panellist will.i.am.

programme.title: The Masked Singer S6 Ep10
programme.desc: Group B Semi-Final - The final four Group B singers are in the semifinals and two are eliminated, and Cheryl Hines returns as a guest panellist.

programme.title: The Masked Singer S6 Ep11
programme.desc: Group A Finale - The final two Group A singers perform solo, and celebrity duet with a celebrity, before one is unmasked and sent home.

programme.title: The Masked Singer S6 Ep12
programme.desc: Group B Finale - The final two Group B singers perform solo and a duet with a panelist, before one is unmasked and sent home.

programme.title: The Masked Singer S6 Ep13
programme.desc: Grand Finale - The winning singers from Group A and B perform, all are unmasked, and one leaves with the Golden Mask trophy.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A successful sports agent, fired for being honorable, fights for his ideals and those who depend on him.

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: Five men who were best friends when they were young kids and are now getting together for the Fourth of July weekend to meet each others' families for the first time. Picking up where they left off, they discover why growing older doesn't mean growing up.

programme.title: Cloudy With A Chance Of Meatballs
programme.desc: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

programme.title: Seven Pounds
programme.desc: The emotional story of a man who will change the lives of seven strangers.

programme.title: The Mask Of Zorro
programme.desc: A young thief seeking revenge for his brother's death is trained by the once-great, aging Zorro, who is pursuing his own vengeance.

programme.title: Global Effect
programme.desc: A soldier (Daniel Bernhardt) leads a band of mercenaries to rescue a scientist (Mädchen Amick) and prevent a terrorist (Joel West) from unleashing a devastating virus.

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

programme.title: Flatliners
programme.desc: A group of medical students are about to die . . . and live to tell about it.

programme.title: A Dark Truth
programme.desc: An ex-CIA op-turned-political talk show host is hired by a corporate whistleblower to expose her company’s cover-up of a massacre in a South American village.

programme.title: Deadly Dormitory
programme.desc: When a University student refuses to sleep with her professor in exchange for good grades, she’s in danger of being killed to keep her quiet, and her mother must drop everything to save her.

programme.title: Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels
programme.desc: Four nice, but petty criminals find themselves heavily in debt to a murderous London gangster after a crooked card game. To cover their debts and literally save their skins, they decide to rob a bunch of thugs who have just robbed a group of pot growers.

programme.title: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Once-incarcerated Marcus Cowans is trying to turn over a new leaf with the support of his loving family. Upon discovering that one of his brothers may have been involved in a horrific crime, Marcus grapples with the limits of brotherhood and loyalty.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep25
programme.desc: Since 1939, more than eight billion Shreddies have been made; watch how it's done. See how a batch of Black Forest cakes take 12,000 cherries to make, and how tzatziki is made by the tanker full.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep26
programme.desc: Watch how lasagne is assembled by both man and machine, and see how one batch of brownies makes 6,500 treats. And you can find out about the secret spice blend for maple caramelized onions.

programme.title: The Hunt (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Hide and Seek follows tigers, harpy eagles, chimpanzees, army ants and other predators as they rise to the challenge of hunting within the forest - a dense, confusing, three-dimensional world.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's India (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: At the Gateway to India on Mumbai harbour, Joanna faces the beautiful stone archway through which she left India in 1947. She also explores India's caste system; an illegal classification that segregates people into social groups from birth.

programme.desc: A look at the Port Building, a stunning, gravity-defying office complex building that appears to hover over a 19th-century fire station, and uses a borehole energy system that makes it one of the most energy efficient buildings in Europe.

programme.title: Animal Einsteins (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Masterminds - Using innovative techniques, Chris Packham investigates how nature's masterminds measure up against human brainpower.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: Our Frozen Planet - Our frozen planet is changing. In this final episode we meet the scientists dedicating their lives to understanding what these changes mean, not just for animals and people who live there, but for the planet as a whole.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's India (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: At the Gateway to India on Mumbai harbour, Joanna faces the beautiful stone archway through which she left India in 1947. She also explores India's caste system; an illegal classification that segregates people into social groups from birth.

programme.title: The Hunt (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Hide and Seek follows tigers, harpy eagles, chimpanzees, army ants and other predators as they rise to the challenge of hunting within the forest - a dense, confusing, three-dimensional world.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Zambezi - Follow the journey of the mighty Zambezi - Africa's wildest river. It floods across endless plains, fuelling the migration of 30,000 wildebeest, turning villages into islands accessible only by boat.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: A look at the Port Building, a stunning, gravity-defying office complex building that appears to hover over a 19th-century fire station, and uses a borehole energy system that makes it one of the most energy efficient buildings in Europe.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Frozen Worlds - From the Poles to the highest mountain peaks, there are surprising frozen worlds found on every continent - home to unique and remarkable animals.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Frozen Ocean - At the top of our planet lies the Arctic Ocean - a shape-shifting world of ice and water, home to unique animals like polar bears, harp seals and bowhead whales.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Frozen Peaks - Found on every continent, mountains create unique frozen worlds, home to extraordinary animals that must overcome the crushing conditions of the cold.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: Frozen South - Antarctica is the most hostile of all Earth's frozen worlds. Yet even here, life finds a way not just to survive but to thrive.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: Frozen Lands - In the far North of our planet lie vast frozen lands of snow-covered forest and open tundra. These are lands of extremes that push animals to their limits.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: Our Frozen Planet - Our frozen planet is changing. In this final episode we meet the scientists dedicating their lives to understanding what these changes mean, not just for animals and people who live there, but for the planet as a whole.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II: Making Of
programme.desc: This fascinating behind-the-scenes special reveals the most memorable moments in the making of this captivating series. Discover the challenges filmmakers faced and the ground-breaking technology they used to capture incredible footage of the north and south poles, from snow-draped forests to remote mountain ranges.

programme.title: The Hunt (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Hide and Seek follows tigers, harpy eagles, chimpanzees, army ants and other predators as they rise to the challenge of hunting within the forest - a dense, confusing, three-dimensional world.

programme.title: Fearless 48 Hours (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Maya Jama - Jason Fox - Foxy from SAS: Who Dares Wins - takes Maya Jama out of her comfort zone for scary physical challenges and some heart-to-heart chat.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: A look at the Port Building, a stunning, gravity-defying office complex building that appears to hover over a 19th-century fire station, and uses a borehole energy system that makes it one of the most energy efficient buildings in Europe.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Happiness - Griff Rhys Jones finishes his journey across Canada in the popular, lifestyle province of British Columbia in the Pacific Northwest and discovers what it is about this place that makes people so happy.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Koala Called Cavendish - Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spiky and Stinky - Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle - Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karina’s fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinic’s toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet who’s quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Weatherproof - Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ocean Voyagers - Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Thiago the Coati Kitten - Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brought Back from the Brink - Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Agile - Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brought Back from the Brink - Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Social - Meet alphas who get by with a little help from their friends. Discover the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins, ponder ant colonies’ unique scents, find out why female geladas always get the last word, and see wolves hunt family-style.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Scrappy - Celebrate small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons. Admire nutrias’ stink bombs; honey badgers’ savage, needle-like choppers; black-tailed gulls’ razor-sharp beaks; and the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Cape Fur Seals - On South Africa’s west coast, Cape fur seals form huge breeding colonies and reproduce. For pups that can’t swim, it’s a challenging start to life as they battle heat, hunger, congestion and ocean storms. Those that survive will take to the water and join the multitude of creatures that surround them.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Secret Life of Mini Marsupials - While all marsupials share similarities, it is some of the rare smaller marsupials that highlight the fascinating contrast between them - and few small marsupials highlight these innate differences better than the quokkas and the quolls.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the Extreme - Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Rio the Giant River Otter Pup - Visit the last stronghold of the giant river otter in Brazil’s beautiful Pantanal wetland. Track pup Rio and his siblings as they test the waters, team up to evade a jaguar ambush, and become a cohesive family unit that hunts and thrives together.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: After the Wildfires - Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Fickle River - Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta’s loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix’s search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Inside Story - Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenya’s wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants’ radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Osprey: Sea Raptor - A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Social - Meet alphas who get by with a little help from their friends. Discover the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins, ponder ant colonies’ unique scents, find out why female geladas always get the last word, and see wolves hunt family-style.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Pointy Bits - Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Scroungers/Scavengers - Go scavenging with nature’s cleanup crew. See Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals; learn how dung beetles roll over the competition; view wild boars’ fierce mating strategies; and watch hyenas’ bone-crushing teeth demolish any meal.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Power of Playtime - Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family - Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Battle to Save a Sea Lion - Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bound By Blood - The southwest corner of New Zealand’s South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Age of Independence - The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world – the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Collisions - Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island - Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island - Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Pointy Bits - Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.desc: Kangaroo Island - Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show (S30) Ep3
programme.desc: Graham Norton presents a lively chat show featuring Colin Farrell, Brendan Gleeson, Kate Hudson, Elizabeth Banks, Edward Enninful, and Self Esteem.

programme.title: George Clarke's Remarkable Renovations (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Stable, Humber - George meets Bernie, whose daughter and son-in-law saw the potential in a ramshackle stable at the end of their garden for the perfect retirement retreat.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: Naomi and Yehuda - Architects Robert and Laura compete using virtual reality to remodel a home in Hertfordshire. Will the finished build live up to the hopes of the family who live there?

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off (S4) Ep1
programme.desc: Cake - The bakers have two hours to bake one family sized signature cake.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep17
programme.desc: The nine strongest and most talented chefs return to the MasterChef kitchen for the semi-final round, where they must create a dish based around their favourite food memory.

programme.title: Nadiya's Food Adventure (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: West Country - Nadiya is in the West Country to check out two of her favourite foods, as she meets a jam maker and visits a garlic farm.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off (S4) Ep1
programme.desc: Cake - The bakers have two hours to bake one family sized signature cake.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off (S7) Ep1
programme.desc: It's Cake Day and the first heat of bakers enter the tent. They tackle a stressful sponge in their first-ever tricky Technical and build showstopping cakes depicting their proudest-ever moments.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Rick visits his childhood summer house at Trevose Head then onto Kenidjack Valley Lands End.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off (S4) Ep2
programme.desc: Bread - The bakers will get stuck into baking breads today.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep18
programme.desc: The semi-final stage continues with just eight chefs left in the running for the 2021 title. Four of them compete in a pop-up kitchen challenge.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Hidden Escapes - In New York we visit a hotel hidden airside amongst the hustle and bustle of the John F Kennedy airport - the TWA Hotel. In Finnish Lapland we venture to the deep snow-capped forest of the Urho Kkonen National Park.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Rick visits his childhood summer house at Trevose Head then onto Kenidjack Valley Lands End.

programme.desc: Texas Bbq On St John - A Texas couple buys a BBQ restaurant on St. John and wants to live on St. Thomas in the US Virgin Islands.

programme.title: Caribbean Life S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Beachfront On St Thomas - After visiting the Caribbean on a cruise, a Kansas couple searches for the perfect beachfront condo to start a new adventure in the US Virgin Islands.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Episode 9 - In Madrid's main airport, Madrid-Barajas,5,000 security cameras help agents maintain security. Follow state security forces to discovery how they monitor Spain's borders.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Episode 10 - In Madrid's main airport, Madrid-Barajas,5,000 security cameras help agents maintain security. Follow state security forces to discovery how they monitor Spain's borders.

programme.title: Trip Flip S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Maui - Bert Kreischer gives two Los Angeles locals a free dream vacation to Maui.

programme.title: Trip Flip S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Rome - Bert Kreischer gives two best friends a free surprise 3 day vacation in Rome, Italy.

programme.title: Dead Of Night S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Last Call - Two young mothers living hundreds of miles apart vanish under eerily similar circumstances.

programme.title: Bahamas Life S5 Ep7
programme.desc: Long Island Adventure - An adventurous couple wants to continue trying new experiences in the Bahamas. They must decide between a turnkey home or a fixer-upper.

programme.title: Bahamas Life S5 Ep8
programme.desc: A Place You Never Want To Leave - A couple sold a boat they planned to live on and now need a home on land in Exuma. They want water access and a boat dock but have a tight budget.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown S7 Ep14
programme.desc: Mysteries Of Moses - Josh looks to answer enduring questions around Moses' existence. He opens an ancient Egyptian tomb and treks what could be the true Mount Sinai.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep28
programme.desc: Switched! / Free Range Chickens - Archibald and Cheryl accidentally swap bodies. They must each go through the other’s daily routine, with Archibald pretending to be Cheryl and vice versa, until they can undo the mix up. / When the Strutters go camping, they find a tribe of primitive cave chickens. After Archibald gives them a parting gift, he unknowingly changes their course in history.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep15
programme.desc: It Crushes / Rebel Without A Paws - Eep gets struck with the crush curse when cute new guy, Kevin, comes to Ahhh! Valley. Her and Grug do everything they can to break the curse's hold/ Thunk starts to hang out with liyotes against Grug's wishes when he has a hard time fitting in with kids from school.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep14
programme.desc: Lucky And The Long Way Home - Spirit and Lucky desperately try to find a way back to one another.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep14

While he's talking to Pat about it, his dad gets a call from Ben - a special delivery! Pat discovers it's a giant inflatable shark which is to be the surprise centrepiece of the Sealife day. But when Pat stops to help Alf mend a gate, a mix-up with parcel tape ends up with the whale accidentally inflating and floating off... Pat must use his ingenuity to catch the whale and - most important of all - deliver it in time for the special Sealife Awareness event...

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep4
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Blue Flash - Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Oddbods Adventures (S1) Ep7
